entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets at times mixed with freezing drizzle and rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
